title: ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData.Pitch
description: Gets or sets the pitch of intermittent weld beads.
returns: Pitch of intermittent weld beads (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::GapOrPitch
is false and
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::IntermittentWeld
is true.
Pitch is the length from the center of one weld bead to the center of the next weld bead.
